'A.N.D.I.O.S. Adventure' early development 10/2019

Thank you for playing A.N.D.I.O.S. Adventure!

Controls (Game Boy)

A --- Ok / Interact

B --- Cancel / Toggle Run/Walk

D-Pad --- Move A.D.I.O.S. / Move cursor

Start --- Menu

Select --- N/A Currently

Thanks again for checking out A.N.D.I.O.S. Adventure. Please let me know if you come across any glitches or bugs.
